en: Cheers! / Be happy! (A common, versatile response)

lat: Ejective 'k'. Made without aspiration, held briefly.
Ejective 'p'. Made without aspiration, held briefly.
Ejective 't'. Made without aspiration, held briefly.
Guttural 'g', similar to French or German 'r' (a voiced uvular fricative).
Ejective 'q'. A deeper, throaty, ejective sound.
Ejective 'ts'. Made without aspiration, held briefly.
Ejective 'ch'. Like 'ch' in chip, but held briefly.
